biography.firstAppearance: (as Raven Darkholme) MS. MARVEL #16, (as Mystique) MS. MARVEL #18

work.occupation: Special operative for Germany and the United States governments, (former) German Freedom Fighter, special operative in the Weapon X Project Team

connections.groupAffiliation: Founder and leader of the third Brotherhood of Evil Mutants, now known as Freedom Force; X-Factor, X-Men
connections.relatives: Rogue (unofficial foster daughter), Ralph Brickman (husband), Gloria Brickman (daughter), Graydon Creed (son, deceased)
